name: nativescript-social-login
description: NativeScript plugin for social (token based) log-ins.

scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove android && tns run android --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns run ios
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-social-login && cd ../plugin
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-social-login && tns plugin add ../plugin && tns install
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.setupandinstall: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../plugin && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../plugin && cd ../plugin
